title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations:

For Task A, the response must correctly describe an action being taken by the National Association of Home Builders in the scenario.

For Task B, the response must correctly explain how the action described in Part A affects policy making in Congress. The point for Task B cannot be earned if the point for Task A is not earned.

For Task C, the response must explain how this difference will likely affect the conservationist groupâ€™s strategy in the election.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question. [NOTE: Task B is not included in the list below, as the point for this task cannot be earned independently of the point for Task A.]
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question. [NOTE: The point for Task B cannot be earned if the point for Task A is not earned.]
The response accomplishes all three of the tasks set by the question.
